channel.title: Cognitive Services on Midnight Programmer
channel.description: Recent content in Cognitive Services on Midnight Programmer

item.title: Extract Text From Images Using Computer Vision API And Azure Function
item.description: I started to work on a project which is a combination of lot of intelligent APIs and Machine Learning stuff. One of the things I have to accomplish is to extract the text from the images that are being uploaded to the storage. To accomplish this part of the project I planned to use Microsoft Cognitive Service Computer Vision API. Here is the extract of it from my architecture diagram.
